about.title: About Second Hand
about.description1: Our mission is to make sustainable fashion accessible to everyone while reducing textile waste. We believe that every piece of clothing deserves a second chance.
about.description2: Founded in 2020, we've helped thousands of customers find unique, high-quality pieces while contributing to a more sustainable future.
